title: Capital Gains Tax
description: Washington capital gains excise tax structure, revenue, and distribution

data.notes: Classified as excise tax; applies to stocks, bonds, business interests; excludes real estate and retirement

data.data_point: WA capital gains tax FY2024 revenue
data.source_name: WA Dept of Revenue News Release
data.notes: Net payments as of June 2, 2025; 34% increase over FY2023 ($418.6M); 3,403 extensions pending

data.data_point: WA capital gains tax deduction threshold
data.notes: Standard deduction; only gains above this amount are taxed

data.data_point: WA total long-term capital gains realized (all filers)
data.notes: Federal long-term capital gains reported by WA filers; includes gains exempt from state tax (real estate, retirement)

data.data_point: WA capital gains tax FY2022 revenue (first year)
data.source_name: WA Dept of Revenue News Release
data.notes: First year of tax; higher due to market conditions

data.data_point: WA capital gains tax FY2023 revenue
data.notes: Down from FY2022 due to market downturn; 34% below FY2024

data.data_point: WA capital gains tax 2025 tier 2 rate
data.notes: New tier added in 2025 legislation; gains up to $1M remain at 7%

data.data_point: Estimated WA state-taxable capital gains base
data.source_name: Derived from WA DOR revenue and IRS SOI
data.notes: Back-calculated: $560.6M revenue / 7% rate â‰ˆ $8B taxable base; total gains ~$17.8B but real estate, retirement, sub-threshold gains excluded
